item.title: Merck and 26 Other Companies Sell New High-Grade Bonds
item.description: Merck & Co. sold $6 billion of investment-grade bonds Tuesday to help fund its acquisition of fellow drugmaker Verona Pharma Plc, as more than two dozen firms kick off a seasonally busy period for
